title: One Bedrooms Available Now!
map_address: 110 Jacob Fontaine Ln near Airport Blvd
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 647-863 Sq.
With two apartment resident buildings, mouthwatering eateries, an urban market, coffee house, and so much more, everything you’ve been looking for in a community is here.
From the sophisticated and modern interiors, to the inviting, artfully-curated amenity spaces, Fivetwo is your new life, redesigned.
It’s perfect for the way you live.
- Washer and Dryer in All Homes
- Custom Backsplash and Chrome Gooseneck Faucets
- Elegant Quartz Countertops & Resilient Wood-style Flooring
- Soaker Tubs, Shower and Tub Soap Niches
- Contemporary Dark or White Color Scheme Options
- Select Homes with Stoops, Fenced-in Yards, and Mudrooms
- 8' Doors and 12' Ceilings on First Floor
- North Building Club Features a Theatre and Conference Room
- Open-concept Co-working Space with Four Privacy Booths
- Two Pool Courtyards (One in Each Building)
- Dog Run by the North & South Building
- SkyWalk Corridor Between North and South Resident Buildings
- South Building Club Features a Pool Table
- Shaded Outdoor Pool Table, Fire Pit, and Lawn Games
- Demonstration Kitchen, Fitness Center, and Yoga Studio
- A Neighborhood Market, Coffee House, Salon, and Yoga Studio
- Access to Gateway Park with Art Installations
Dogs and Cats Allowed: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home with a $600 pet fee (non-refundable).
